skills.name: CHAINS OF GREED
desc: • Deals 4 hits of true damage to all enemies.
• 15% Chance to inflict Punishment for 2 turns every hit.
• 25% Chance to grant Perfect Immunity to a random ally for 2 turns every hit.
• Heal all allies for 10% of MAX HP every hit and Wake any allies suffering from Sleep effects.

skills.name: GIFTS UNGIVEN
desc: • Steal All Beneficial Effects from the enemy.
• Inflict Perfect Corruption for 5 turns on the target.
• Increase Beneficial Effect Duration by 1 turn and grant Echo for 2 turns to each ally if Ghost is active on them.

skills.name: SILENT MISERY
desc: Whenever an ally would die instead Heal them to Full HP, apply Ghost and Immunity for 3 turns, and Inflict Perfect Silence on a random target for the duration of battle.
